questions.text: You find a bag of gold on the street. What do you do?

answers.text: Turn it in to the guards.
Ask around to find its owner.

questions.text: You witness someone being extorted. How do you react?

answers.text: Intervene, citing local laws and threaten to get the guards.
Ignore it. It's not your business.
Sneak behind the extortionists and pickpocket them.
